title: Well of Goodwill

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Well of Goodwill was a special well located east of Varrock West Bank. Players could donate coins or items (which were counted for their value in gold coins), and for every million coins donated, Jagex donated one dollar to a charity listed on the well's interface.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Well of Goodwill
 Well of Goodwill was removed after an update.
As the contents of this page no longer exist in Old School RuneScape, this article is preserved for historical purposes.
Well of Goodwill
Released30 October 2014 (Update)
MembersNo
QuestNo
LocationSouth of the Grand Exchange (Varrock)
OptionsDonate, Donate-items
ExamineThere's a lot of money at the bottom.
Advanced data
Object IDremoved

The Well of Goodwill was a special well located east of Varrock West Bank. Players could donate coins or items (which were counted for their value in gold coins), and for every million coins donated, Jagex donated one dollar to a charity listed on the well's interface.

It only accepted certain items, and coins in multiples of 1,000.

Openings[edit | edit source]

  • 25 February 2016
  • 19 February 2015
  • 30 October 2014
The well's donation interface.

Concept art[edit | edit source]

Closings[edit | edit source]

  • 10 December 2014

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Originally, the bowl wig was planned to be a reward for donating to the well. This idea was later scrapped, and the item was added to Treasure Trails rewards instead.
  • During the Well's opening on October 3rd 2014 Jagex setup Milestones for the community to hit, rewarding them in game for each milestone hit.
    • 10 Billion - Supreme Leader haircut
    • 25 Billion - The Bowl haircut
    • 50 Billion - Ash Emote
    • 100 Billion - A cosmetic item of the communities choice.

Once these milestones were hit, the above rewards were unlocked for everyone in Old School.
